package.name: Math_Stats
package.description: Classes to calculate statistical parameters of numerical arrays of data. The data can be in a simple numerical array, or in a cummulative numerical array. A cummulative array, has the value as the index and the number of repeats as the value for the array item, e.g. $data = array(3=>4, 2.3=>5, 1.25=>6, 0.5=>3). Nulls can be rejected, ignored or handled as zero values.

release.notes: Bug fix in __sumdiff() and in __sumabsdev(), which made the variance, standard deviation, etc. be calculated incorrectly.
